text: :Northern Belle may refer to: * FV Northern Belle, a fishing vessel that sank in the Gulf of Alaska on 20 April 2010 * Northern Belle (train), a luxury train in the UK * Northern Belle (1875 ship), a steamship that served Great Lakes ports, until she was destroyed in a sudden fire * Northern Belle, heroic efforts saved the crew of this widely publicized wreck
title: Northern Belle (disambiguation)
